item.title: Teaching experience
item.description: Teaching assistant Statistical inference, for second year economy bachelor students, (90h), 2018, 2020, 2021 Confidence interval and tests Definition of an estimator Maximum likelihood estimator and likelihood tests Introduction to statistics , for second year management bachelor students, (68h), 2019, 2020 Probability distributions (Binomial, Poisson, Gaussian) Confidence interval and tests (Mean, Variance and Proportion)
